name: Coin Plinko
description:
Coin Plinko brings you an amazing gaming experience!
Challenge your luck and skills, trigger splendid coins rain!

How to play
- Choose a location on the table to drop tokens.
- When a token lights a bulb, you’ll be rewarded with bonus tokens.
- Light all 9 bulbs to activate the slot machine.
- Use tools to clear all obstacles for 60 seconds or auto-light 1 of the 9 bulbs.

Features
-easy control
-100% risk-free
-Addictive gameplay
-Earn tokens even when you are offline!
